contents.text: Welcome to WayUp in New York, where your career starts by connecting college students and recent graduates with leading employers.
If you are a college student or recent graduate seeking job or internship opportunities, press 1.
To explore current internships and entry-level openings, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our job opportunities portal.

navigationGoals: Quickly browse and apply to current entry-level job and internship openings
Browse entry-level project management internships in New York that value my military leadership background.
I need to retrieve the latest entry-level software engineering and internship listings from your job portal.
Help me find entry-level job openings for my granddaughter.
I’d like to browse current physics internships and entry-level roles available through WayUp.

contents.text: For resume tips, interview prep, and career resources, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to a career services specialist.

navigationGoals: Get concise resume feedback and interview preparation tips from a career specialist
Get help translating my veteran experience into a civilian resume and practice interview questions.
I’d like to get resume optimization guidelines and algorithmic interview prep resources.
Connect me with someone for resume and interview guidance for my grandson.
I need advice on tailoring my physics resume and preparing for upcoming internship interviews.

contents.text: If you are an employer looking to recruit top college talent, press 2.
To post a new job or internship opportunity, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our employer services team.

navigationGoals: Post a new job or internship opportunity for recruiting recent grads
Post a new summer internship opportunity at my veteran-owned tech startup for college students.
I want to post a new junior backend engineer internship on the employer portal.
I need to post a new internship opportunity for my small business.
I want to post a new physics research internship opening on your platform.

contents.text: For information on our talent acquisition solutions and pricing, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to a talent acquisition consultant.

navigationGoals: Obtain pricing details for WayUp’s talent acquisition solutions
Ask about pricing and packages for posting job and internship listings for my small business on WayUp.
I need detailed pricing and API integration options for your talent acquisition solutions.
I want information on your employer recruitment service pricing.
I’m looking for details on pricing and packages for recruiting college talent.
